```{r}
source(here('R', 'librerie.R'))
library(flextable)
library(binom)

dt <- read_excel(here("dati", "anaplasma.xlsx"))

```

# CAPITOLO


```{r}

tabella <- dt %>% 
  group_by(year, specie, area, esito) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = esito, values_from = n, values_fill = 0) %>% 
  mutate(Prevalenza = round(P/N, 2)) %>% 
  select(-N, -P) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = year, values_from = Prevalenza)

flextable(tabella)

```


```{r}
tlong <- dt %>% 
  group_by(year, specie, area, esito) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = esito, values_from = n, values_fill = 0) %>% 
  mutate(Esaminati = P+N, 
    Prevalenza = round(P/Esaminati, 2)) 


tlong %>% 
  bind_cols( 
binom.confint(tlong$P, tlong$Esaminati, methods = "exact")
)
  





```
